detail_desc: Straw hat in a jute blend with a braided imitation leather band and a cotton band inside. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Thigh boots in soft imitation suede with a drawstring at the top and pointed toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Thigh boots in soft imitation suede with a drawstring at the top and pointed toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Suede sandals with a decorative bow at the front, shimmering metallic details and an ankle strap with a hook and loop tab. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shopper in soft suede with handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and large outer compartment. Unlined. Size 13x35x38 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather and fabric with a heel strap and a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Top in marled sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen and pleats at the top. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.

Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.

Calf-length, jacquard-weave dress in softly draping viscose with a sheen. Double layer at the top, long, asymmetric ties that can be fastened front or back, a small opening at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Maxi dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative ties. Unlined.
5-pocket, striped, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
High-waisted, jacquard-weave trousers in softly draping viscose with a sheen. Concealed zip in one side, vertical seams front and back and straight legs with flared, asymmetric hems.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Calf-length skirt in twill with a slight sheen, high paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, a concealed zip at the back and high slits front and back. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jersey vest top in a cotton blend with raw edges around the neckline and armholes.
Jersey vest top in a cotton blend with raw edges around the neckline and armholes.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Lined hood with a peak and an elastic drawstring front and back. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastener and a zipped lift pass pocket on one sleeve. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, asymmetric hems with embroidered lace.
Ankle-length jeans in coated stretch twill with a high waist and visible zip at the front. Fake welt front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with slits in the sides and no buttons. Unlined.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with slits in the sides and no buttons. Unlined.
Rugby shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Short skirt in soft jersey with a washed-look. Elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a diagonal seam and short slit at the front. Slightly longer at the front.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with embroidery on the front, a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
Pleated, calf-length crêpe skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Bag in braided paper straw with imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two small inner compartments. Lined. Size 12x34x49 cm.
Bag in braided paper straw with imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two small inner compartments. Lined. Size 12x34x49 cm.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, opening with ties at the back and long trumpet sleeves.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, opening with ties at the back and long trumpet sleeves.
Short shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with twisted, tasselled ties. Side pockets and inset hemstitching at the hems.
Short shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with twisted, tasselled ties. Side pockets and inset hemstitching at the hems.
Airy blouse in a modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers at the neckline, concealed hook-and-eye fastenings at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Airy blouse in a modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers at the neckline, concealed hook-and-eye fastenings at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Airy blouse in a modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers at the neckline, concealed hook-and-eye fastenings at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections, a detachable faux fur collar, diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and zips at the cuffs. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with broderie anglaise, a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
One-shoulder top in an airy weave with a wide, embroidered, raw-edge flounce and elastication at the top.
One-shoulder top in an airy weave with a wide, embroidered, raw-edge flounce and elastication at the top.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
